metadata.title: Memo CLI - AI Coding Agent for Terminal
metadata.description: Memo is a lightweight, open-source coding agent that runs in your terminal. Code faster with AI assistance through natural language.

home.title: A lightweight coding agent that runs in your terminal.
home.subtitle: Memo understands your project structure, runs tools safely, and helps you move from prompt to patch without leaving the shell.

features.title: Built for real engineering workflows
features.subtitle: Keep the stack simple: clean output, explicit steps, and tooling that fits daily development.

terminalNative.title: Terminal-native
terminalNative.description: Works where you already ship: directly inside your terminal workflow.

fastFeedback.title: Fast feedback
fastFeedback.description: Optimized for quick iteration, from reading code to applying changes.

builtInTools.title: Built-in tools
builtInTools.description: File I/O, grep, commands, and patching are available out of the box.

approvalControls.title: Approval controls
approvalControls.description: Dangerous operations can require confirmation before execution.

mcpReady.title: MCP ready
mcpReady.description: Connect external capabilities through the Model Context Protocol.

multiAgent.title: Multi-agent mode
multiAgent.description: Delegate subtasks to subagents when work needs to fan out.

architecture.title: System architecture design
architecture.subtitle: A clean layered map of Memo CLI internals, kept consistent with the current Linear-style visual language.

quickstart.title: Get productive in under a minute
quickstart.subtitle: Install, configure a provider, and launch the interactive CLI.

ctaSection.subtitle: Install Memo and start working with an agent that stays inside your terminal.
